data.text:
Tina and I were honored to attend the 74th National Prayer Breakfast and join in prayer for our nation.

God bless America. https://t.co/1VcahTxCcS

Wishing the best of luck to Ohio athletes as they compete in the 2026 Winter Olympics.
 
You make our state and our country proud! 

https://t.co/Xqg49WZQi5

Jobs are returning to Ohio.
 
From investments to factory construction, our state is ready to ensure that Made-in-America means Made-in-Ohio. https://t.co/u8ENlTjT9T

Ohioans want jobs, affordability, and good quality of life—and the Working Families Tax Cuts Act delivers.
 
From no tax on tips, no tax on overtime, and a $2,200 child tax credit, life will become more affordable for working families. https://t.co/Ae686C6d9P

Let’s make it easy to vote and hard to cheat.
 
With the SAVE Act, we can do both. https://t.co/77W5ReKPvW

As a father to two female athletes and the husband of another, I know how critical it is that we protect women’s and girls’ opportunities in sports.
 
On National Girls and Women in Sports Day, we celebrate their accomplishments across the globe, and renew our pledge to preserve https://t.co/lZo71k62NN

No matter who’s playing in the Super Bowl, Ohio is still on the field.

From the Pro Football Hall of Fame in Canton to the Wilson manufacturing plant in Ada, football runs through Ohio.

Have a fun and safe Super Bowl weekend! https://t.co/Igu3LHCHq7
The tax benefits in the Working Families Tax Cuts Act allow Ohioans to keep more of what they earn! https://t.co/btUCUduK60

Ohio has more than 5,000 miles of rail. As we’re reminded of the tragedy in East Palestine, ensuring our rail freight operates safely is more important than ever.

I had a great meeting with Teamsters Rail Conference President Mark Wallace to talk about how we can do just that. https://t.co/80B7ZFpXle

Millions of Americans face a benefits cliff: A dramatic decrease in federal assistance for receiving a small raise in income.
 
My Upward Mobility Act would solve this problem by allowing states to group federal benefits to cater to individual Americans’ needs, instead of a https://t.co/MWmIkTTGaC
